title: Prototype Hunt 32 carbon wheels spotted with hookless rims, carbon spokes
content:
We first spotted these at the Tour de France, with plenty of photos but fewer confirmed specs. After spending a few days riding these samples around Philly and displaying them on Pratt’s custom steel bikes at the expo, Hunt’s shared some early specs with us, too. The upcoming Hunt 32 UD Carbon Spoke wheels will

The post Prototype Hunt 32 carbon wheels spotted with hookless rims, carbon spokes appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
